statements: SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData;
SELECT indicator_id, indicator_type, indicator_value FROM ThreatIntelligenceData ORDER BY indicator_id DESC;
SELECT description, indicator_type FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE indicator_type = 'malware';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE timestamp > '2022-03-15 00:00:00';
SELECT indicator_id, indicator_value FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE description LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData ORDER BY indicator_value DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT indicator_type, COUNT(indicator_type) AS count FROM ThreatIntelligenceData GROUP BY indicator_type HAVING COUNT(indicator_type) > 1;
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value, description FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE indicator_type = 'IP' AND description LIKE '%malicious%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value, timestamp FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value, description FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE indicator_value IN ('123.456.789.1', 'example.com') ORDER BY indicator_type ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData;
SELECT id, indicator FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE timestamp >= '2021-07-01';
SELECT description FROM ThreatDetectionLogs WHERE detection_type = 'Malware';
SELECT id, description FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE indicator LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM ThreatDetectionLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, indicator, description FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT id, timestamp, indicator FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatDetectionLogs WHERE detection_type = 'Malware' AND description LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, MAX(id) AS max_id, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM ThreatDetectionLogs;
SELECT * FROM threat_indicators
SELECT incident_name, incident_description FROM incidents
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value FROM threat_indicators ORDER BY indicator_type DESC
SELECT incident_name, threat_level FROM incidents WHERE threat_level > 3
SELECT * FROM threat_analysis ORDER BY analysis_id ASC
SELECT * FROM threat_indicators WHERE indicator_type = 'Malware'
SELECT incident_name, incident_date FROM incidents WHERE threat_level > 5
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value FROM threat_indicators ORDER BY indicator_type DESC
SELECT * FROM threat_analysis JOIN incidents ON threat_analysis.incident_id = incidents.incident_id
SELECT DISTINCT incident_name, threat_level FROM incidents
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM ThreatActors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, last_seen FROM ThreatActors WHERE last_seen >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, indicator_type, value FROM Indicators WHERE indicator_type = 'IP';
SELECT type, severity, date_occurred FROM Incidents WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, affiliation FROM ThreatActors WHERE affiliation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Indicators WHERE indicator_type='IP' AND source='Firewall' AND description LIKE '%malicious%' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT t.name AS ThreatActor, i.type AS IncidentType, i.severity AS IncidentSeverity FROM ThreatActors t JOIN ThreatIntel ti ON t.id = ti.threat_actor_id JOIN Incidents i ON i.id = ti.incident_id;

SELECT DISTINCT i.type AS IncidentType, COUNT(ti.id) AS NumOfRecords FROM Incidents i LEFT JOIN ThreatIntel ti ON i.id = ti.incident_id GROUP BY i.type HAVING COUNT(ti.id) > 1 ORDER BY NumOfRecords DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors;
SELECT id, name FROM ThreatActors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description, primary_motivation FROM ThreatActors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, indicator_type, indicator_value, threat_actor_id FROM Indicators WHERE threat_actor_id = 2;
SELECT id, incident_date, description FROM Incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors;
SELECT id, name, description FROM ThreatActors ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Indicators WHERE source='External';
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE description LIKE '%data breach%';
SELECT id, incident_date FROM Incidents WHERE threat_actor_id IN (SELECT id FROM ThreatActors WHERE primary_motivation='Financial Gain');
